summary: A documentary about fashion icon Iris Apfel, the 93-year-old style maven who has had an out-sized presence on the New York fashion scene for decades, from legendary late 88-year-old documentary filmmaker Albert Maysles.
cast: Iris Apfel|Harold Koda|Dries Van Noten|Inez Bailey|Bruce Weber|Carl Apfel|Duro Olowu|Margaret Russell|Billy Apfel|Alexis Bittar|Tavi Gevinson|Linda Fargo|David Hoey|James Gager|Rory Gevis|Nancy Prideaux|Naeem Khan|Jenna Lyons|Mickey Boardman|Paula Richter|Lynda Hartigan|Jacqueline Kennedy|Albert Maysles
keywords: fashion show|fashion institute of technology|flamboyant|little black dress|makeover
title: Iris
